startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Direct Indeed search URLs to scrape. (e.g. https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=Software+Engineer&l=New+York)

companyUrls.title: Company URLs
companyUrls.description: Direct Indeed company job URLs to scrape. (e.g. https://www.indeed.com/cmp/Google/jobs)

companyNames.title: Company Names
companyNames.description: Specific companies to search for jobs from. (e.g. ['Google', 'Microsoft'])

country.title: Country
country.description: Country to search in (e.g., US, IN, UK)

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to scrape

resetSeenKeys.title: Reset Seen Keys
resetSeenKeys.description: If true, the internal memory of already scraped jobs will be cleared for this run.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. RESIDENTIAL is highly recommended for Indeed.

bulkQueries.title: Bulk Searches
bulkQueries.description: Multiple search queries in one run

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages processed at once. Cheerio can handle 10-50 safely.

scrapeCompanyDetails.title: Scrape Company Details
scrapeCompanyDetails.description: If true, the scraper will visit company pages to extract details like website, industry, and size.

maxCompanyPages.title: Max Company Pages
maxCompanyPages.description: Maximum number of unique company detail pages to scrape. 0 = unlimited.
